title: Trans-Canada journey
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Canada - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Voyages and travels
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Film festivals - Canada - Montreal - Awards
description: A jet-liner spans the miles, sheering through clouds to open sky and scenic vistas of the provinces below. Glimpses of town and country, of people of many ethnic origins, of a resourceful and industrious nation - impressions it would take days and weeks to gather at first hand - are brought to you in this vivid 1800 kilometer panorama. Narrated by Christopher Plummer. (Awards: Montreal; Marseille; Grignasco)
